title: Support
faq.title: Frequently asked questions

faq.items.q: I didn’t receive the license email. What should I do?
faq.items.a: Check the Spam/Promotions folders and make sure the email in your order is correct. If there’s no email, submit a ticket with your order_id and we’ll resend the key.
Open the GetLifeUndo browser extension → Settings → License → paste your key. Restart the browser after activation.
It’s a package: Pro for 6 months + a bonus feature flag (“starter_bonus”) for the same term. The end date is shown in your account.
We follow a fair refund policy in reasonable cases. Describe your situation in a ticket, include your email and order_id — we’ll sort it out.
Yes. Tell us your current plan and the desired one. We’ll propose the most beneficial option.

form.title: Contact support
form.sent: Thanks! We’ve received your request and will reply to {email}.
form.placeholder.message: Describe the situation. You can include links to screenshots.
banner.testMode: Test mode is enabled. For payment questions, include your order_id: {order_id}.
